title: Didnt recive LP for a win
body:
Hello,

I played 5 ranked games today. I usually recive +20lp for a win and -15 for a loose. 
I had 0 points when i started today games and won 3 games in row, so i should have 60 points, but instead after 3 won games i had 40 points. 
I tought it will just load later on, but after 2 more games i still didnt recive my LP for the win.  (If you look in my history game, it was the game where i played{{champion:103}}. 
After the {{champion:103}} game, the score board didnt load, so i just skipped that, but i didnt recive any LP for the win. 
I lost 2 games after that and now after 3 wins and 2 looses i am on 8 points, but i should have ~25 LP.

Was it only me, or some1 had same thing today?

PS. All the games were Solo/Duo, it was not my mistake if you would want to say "Maybe u played normal draft" or something.

replies.body: After checking the [**Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune), it looks like EUNE is still dealing with these LP troubles. The devs are still working on a fix, and we can all get updates by checking the status page.
